AI Description: Subversion (SVN) is an open-source version control system that allows users to manage files and directories, track changes in the source code, and collaborate with team members on software development projects.
Core Features: Version Control System, Branching & Merging, File & Directory Metadata, Atomic Commits, Tagging & Labeling, Authentication & Authorization
General Tags: Version Control, Software Development, Collaboration, Teamwork
